meanings.sent1: The rule was unenforceable due to lack of authority.
meanings.sent2: The contract became unenforceable after the deadline passed.
meanings.sent3: It was comical how the unenforceable parking sign confused everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her promise to always be on time was as unenforceable as trying to catch the wind.
meanings.sent5: The unenforceable nature of the decree left everyone puzzled.

meanings.sent1: The agreement was unenforceable because it lacked a signature.
meanings.sent2: The court declared the new law unenforceable due to constitutional issues.
meanings.sent3: It seemed almost silly how the unenforceable contract caused so much trouble.
meanings.sent4: The unenforceable nature of their pact made it as fragile as glass.
meanings.sent5: The unenforceable nature of the policy led to chaos in the office.
